title: FM Sitharaman urges AIIB to help poor nations avail of finances
description: Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman urged AIIB to maintain a client-centric approach and support low-income countries with financial resources. During a meeting with AIIB President Jin Liqun, she praised the bank's rapid growth. India, as the second-largest shareholder, aims to strengthen ties further. She also discussed investment opportunities with Qatar's Finance Minister.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
